item.title: Create pdf file for huge phylogenetic tree
item.description: Viewing and annotation of a huge phylogenetic tree, especially with hundreds or even thousamds taxa, is always a problem. This post provides a method to split a phylogenetic tree into multiple pages of a PDF file by pdfposter. 1. Install pdfposter There are several ways to install this utility. 1.1 Install via OS package manager sudo apt-get install pdfposter 1.2 Install via pip Note: It depends Pythonn 3.x
